angular.questionText: Which of the following is true about ng-app directive?

options.text: ng-app directive defines and links an AngularJS application to HTML.
ng-app directive indicates the start of the application.

angular.explanation: ng-app directive defines and links an AngularJS application to HTML. It also indicate the start of the application.?

angular.questionText: $rootScope is the parent of all of the scope variables.?
angular.explanation: $rootScope is the parent of all of the scope variables.
